# 计算斐波那契数列的前7个数字 (1, 1, 2, 3, 5, 8, 13)
# addi x1, x0, 1 (R1 = 1)
0b00000000000_00001_00000_00001_000010
# addi x2, x0, 1 (R2 = 1)
0b00000000000_00001_00000_00010_000010
# addi x4, x0, 2 (R4 = 2)
0b00000000000_00010_00000_00100_000010
# addi x5, x0, 7 (R5 = 7)
0b00000000000_00111_00000_00101_000010
# add x3, x1, x2 (R3 = R1 + R2)
0b00000000000_00010_00001_00011_000001
# add x1, x0, x2 (R1 = R2)
0b00000000000_00010_00000_00001_000001
# add x2, x0, x3 (R2 = R3)
0b00000000000_00011_00000_00010_000001
# addi x4, x4, 1 (R4 = R4 + 1)
0b00000000000_00001_00100_00100_000010
# bne x4, x5, -16 (如果R4 != R5，跳回16字节)
0b11111111111_00101_00100_10000_000011
# halt
0b00000000000_00000_00000_00000_000000
